enhancements.displayName: Run Speed, Jump, Flight Speed, Range

description.long: Enhances the range of a teleport power by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}%, the flight speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Fly.Scale}%, the jumping ability of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Jump.Scale}% and the run speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Run.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can be slotted into any travel power and will enhance run speed, jumping, flight speed and teleport range.  UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.

enhancements.displayName: Run Speed, Jump, Flight Speed, Range/Endurance

description.long: Enhances the range of a teleport power by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}%, the flight speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Fly.Scale}%, the jumping ability of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Jump.Scale}%, the run speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Run.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can be slotted into any travel power and will enhance run speed, jumping, flight speed and teleport range.  UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.
UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Reduces Slow effects by 20%.  NOTE: This enhancement can be slotted into any travel power.
